major: Frontend Web Developer, Front End Engineer

items.desc: I’m a frontend developer with extensive experience building responsive and accessible websites. I’ve worked on multiple projects across all development stages—from gathering requirements to deployment—with a strong focus on performance and user experience. My tech stack includes TypeScript, React, Next.js, and other modern tools. I’ve also led teams and managed server hardware deployments. Having worked with both U.S.-based and Russian teams, I’ve developed a flexible and adaptable problem-solving approach.

details: Developed over 10 responsive websites for local business clients using React, Next.js, and TypeScript
Improved website loading times and other performance metrics by an average of 30% through performance optimizations like code splitting and lazy loading
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver accessible, user-friendly interfaces
Personally assembled and installed server equipment in over 600 server racks, ensuring high quality, reliability, and security
Led a team of 4 specialists, increasing operational efficiency by 25% through optimized onboarding and training processes
Coordinated work with contractors and cross-functional teams to improve communication and project management

items.desc: Bachelor of Science in Audiovisual Engineering
